/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by a variety of buildings and trees. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise in the background, their monotone palette punctuated by occasional splashes of blue and green. The trees, on the other hand, are a mix of green and brown, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details of the cityscape.
